column1: METHODS Sample collection Microbial plankton samples were collected on the spring 2016 AZMP mission ( HUD2016003 April 925) aboard the CCGS Hudson along three stations from the Halifax Line ( HL, Figure S1) with samples from four depths each: HL2 ( 44. 2664, 63. 3169; 1 m, 20 m, 40 m, 80 m), HL4 ( 43. 4813, 62. 4541; 1 m, 20 m, 40 m, 60 m) and HL6 ( 42. 8321, 61. 7324; 1 m, 20 m, 50 m, 80 m).
